BP_Action_Jump

Path: /Game/AdvancedTurnBasedTileToolkit/Maps/Demo/Actions/BP_Action_Jump

.. cpp:class:: BP_Action_Jump : public BP_Action_C

Moves the specified puppet in an arc between the specified locations and calls on it to play a jump animation.
